document.full_text: egypt is planning to open the blockaded border with gaza and normalizing relations with two of israel and the west's islamist foes, hamas and iran.
document.title: in shift, egypt warms to iran and hamas, israel's foes
lines_and_colors: egypt is planning to open the blockaded border with gaza and normalizing relations with two of israel and the west's islamist foes, hamas and iran.
